summary: VEHICLE HAD A STRONG FUEL ODOR.  VEHICLE WAS CHECKED AFTER ENGINE LINE CAME ON. MAIN FUEL LINE CONNECTED TO FUEL PUMP CAME APART AND VEHICLE WAS LEAKING FUEL.  IF I HAD A COLLISION CAR WOULD HAVE EXPLODED DUE TO AMOUNT OF FUEL LEAKING.  NEW FUEL PUMP WAS REPLACED COST  TO 400.00 PLUS LABOR COSTS.  JUST BOUGHT USED VEHICLE IN AUGUST 2009 FROM DEALER.  *TR
